mapper.select: SELECT M.ID,M_NAME,M_EMAIL,M_PASSWORD,M_PHONE, (SELECT (SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),1,4)-SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(M_BIRTHDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),1,4))+1 AS AGE FROM MEMBERS WHERE ID=#{id}) AS AGE, M_GENDER,M_ADDRESS,M_JOB,M_REGDATE,M_USEABLE,M_MARIABLE,M_BIRTHDATE,M_FAVORITE,M_PROFILE_IMG,PO_POINT FROM MEMBERS M LEFT JOIN POINT P ON M.ID=P.ID WHERE M.ID=#{id} AND M_PASSWORD=#{m_password}
SELECT ID FROM MEMBERS WHERE ID=#{id}

SELECT M.ID,M_NAME,M_EMAIL,M_PASSWORD,M_PHONE, (SELECT (SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),1,4)-SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(M_BIRTHDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),1,4))+1 AS M_AGE FROM MEMBERS WHERE ID=#{id}) AS M_AGE, M_GENDER,M_ADDRESS,M_JOB,M_REGDATE,M_USEABLE,M_MARIABLE,M_BIRTHDATE,M_FAVORITE,M_PROFILE_IMG,PO_POINT FROM MEMBERS M LEFT JOIN POINT P ON M.ID=P.ID WHERE M.ID=#{id}
